Product.Product_Name: Tenaya Tatanka Climbing Shoes - 4 - White / Orange
Product.Long_Description: Features of the Tenaya Tantanka Climbing Shoes The Tatanka Features a Highly asymmetrical last for an aggressive attacking angle on cutting edge climbs. The sensitive Midsole and stretchy neoprene tongue make the Tatanka Fit like a glove, allowing you to move through steep terrain with exact precision. Whether you?re crushing on the steeps, or looking for the utmost in comfort, the Tatanka is a safe bet. The last has a larger heel cup than the Ra, and a slightly lower volume in the forefoot. Also, climbers with a longer second toe will feel right at home in the Tatanka.

A stiff platform on a 3.5mm Stealth HF; rubber Outsole grips various types of rock so you can conquer old and new problems alike. Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Men's Miura Shoe - 34 - Yellow / Black
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Men's Miura Shoe is a Performance Climbing shoe for Technical routes to the gym. The over ten year La Sportiva classic Features speed lacing for a secure Fit all the way up new or favorite routes. The leather Upper combined with a Dentex lining allows for a controlled stretch, sinking your foot into comfort with continued use. The downturned toe with High asymmetry helps you find and stay in the pockets. The shoe is finished off with the XS Edge rubber, allowing you to stick to edges and smear like a champ. Features of the La Sportiva Men's Miura Shoe Slingshot rand connected to the power hinge under the shoe wraps around the entire foot preventing stretch and driving the foot forward for a powerful forefoot Fit Speed lacing system for quick lace-ups 8 panel directional lining for channeling stretch Slip last construction for added sensitivity to help you feel and grip edges Ideal for overhanging sport routes, bouldering, gym Climbing and Technical face Climbing Vibram? XS Edge sole is incredibly resistant to deformation on razor sharp edges and will not creep when smearing

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Vapor Climbing Shoe - 37 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Vapor Climbing Shoe is a lace up Climbing shoe for trad routes. An asymmetric shape and stiff, moderate downturned profile keeps your feet sticking on tiny ledges and cracks. The Vibram; XS Edge rubber Outsole is 3.5mm thick and sticky for gripping rock. Features of the Scarpa Vapor Climbing Shoe Medium charged Bi-Tension Active randing provides comfort Vibram XS Edge provides incredible grip and durability Full length Outsole Single piece synthetic Upper reduces stretch Luxurious padded tongue ensures all-day cushioning

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva Women's Miura Shoe - 33 - Ice
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Women's Miura Shoe is a Climbing shoe for tearing it up on new and imaginative routes. The Women's Miura has been a classic for over 10 years with La Sportiva, providing Performance on various types of rock, at the gym, and bouldering sites. The slingshot rand combines with the powerhinge, effectively stretching the shoe at the back half, so your toes stay on the edge where you want them. That sounds super Technical, and I'm all confused. I asked the Smart guy next to me and he says it means lots of stick on tiny edges, good thing he was around. The Performance Fit Features High asymmetry and the quick lace system tightens them up so they won't slip. The leather Upper is backed with a synthetic lining to minimize stretching so you can get more climbs in. Finished off with a 4mm Vibram XS Grip2 rubber, the durability and stickiness gives all you need for the rock challenge in front of you. Features of the La Sportiva Women's Miura Shoe Slingshot rand connected to the power hinge under the shoe to keep you on edges Speed lacing system for quick lace-ups 8 panel directional lining for channeling stretch Allows great edging control Ideal for overhanging sport routes, bouldering, gym Climbing and Technical face Climbing

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa Stix Climbing Shoe - 35 - Silver
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Stix Climbing Shoe is a Climbing slipper for the toughest, steepest climbs. The microsuede Upper is soft against the foot with a Reinforced Elastic Band to allow for quick entry into the shoe. An X-tension rand that Cradles the foot for power through the toes. The heel pocket is narrow, securing the foot and providing better hooking. The Vibram XS Grip 2 rubber is nice and sticky for edging your way to the top. Features of the Scarpa Stix Climbing Shoe 180g of pure power X-Tension active randing system provides precise Fit and dynamic power REB delivers outstanding Fit and power Vibram XS Grip2 makes these shoes sitck like glue

Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Booster S Climbing Shoe is a Technical shoe for overhanging routes to steep boulder sessions. Putting the power in your toes, the Tri-Tension Active Randing won't add unnecessary weight to your feet either. With a 1/3 length sole, you'll only find sticky Vibram; rubber where you need it. Features of the Scarpa Booster S Climbing Shoe Tri-Tension rand delivers power with minimal weight 1/3 length Vibram sole puts the rubber only where you need it Ultra thin FHL Support ribbon Midsole provides support without compromising sensitivity Microfiber Upper is comfortable and lightweight Vibram XS grip2 makes these shoes stick like glue

Product.Long_Description: If you're looking for a versatile Climbing shoe that does everything well, take a peek at the Scarpa Men's Vapor V Climbing Shoe. This well-rounded Climbing shoe is suitable for various rock Climbing applications including trad, sport, and bouldering. The grippy Vibram; XS Edge sole is supportive, and has a slightly downturned toe making it a great option for steep faces. Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond Men's Momentum Climbing Shoe - 7 - Curry
Product.Long_Description: The Black Diamond Men's Momentum Climbing Shoe is an entry level shoe that oozes comfort and Performance. Built on a flat last, it doesn't force your foot into a curled position, something that won't be so comfy for a new climber. The Velcro; closure makes this easy on/off and an Engineered Knit Technology Upper promotes breathability. The durable 4.3mm rubber holds up to all the gym or crag days in your burgeoning Climbing cAreer. Features of the Black Diamond Men's Momentum Climbing Shoe Neutral, flat last for vertical Climbing and all-day comfort Engineered Knit Technology Upper provides exceptional breathability and comfort 4.3mm NeoFriction rubber is built for durability and molded for optimal consistency and Performance Soft flex Midsole for added sensitivity and comfort Two Velcro straps for Fit adjustability
